story.text:
Here we look at the core criteria for evaluating a [[Learning Organisation]] from the [[Institute of Learning Organisations]]. These criteria can be summarised as:
1. Safety of the [[Learning Environment]]
1. [[Shared Vision]] and goals
1. Following the [[Best Practice]]?
1. [[Self Managed Teams]]?
1. Is there [[Continual Improvement]]?
1. How do we [[Share Learning]]?

# Data
We can visualise the overall quality of the [[learning model]] as practiced in an institution according to the following data points:

6 Learning Environment
4 Shared Vision
8 Best Practice
9 Self Managed Teams
7 Continual Improvement
4 Share Learning
